utterances.transcript: Texas?
caption: texas

utterances.transcript: That's right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states. And Mexico! But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben. Maybe the Lady will help me with these presents.
utterances.transcript_with_note: That's right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states. And Mexico! But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben. (He tries to bend down to pick up the bag with the presents, but can't because of the costume) Maybe the Lady will help me with these presents.
caption: that s right ben i m santa s representative for all the southern states and mexico but santa sent me here to give you these presents ben maybe the lady will help me with these presents

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Monica picks up the bag, while Ross closes the door and hits Monica with his tail. They walk into the living room, and Monica empties the bag.]

utterances.transcript: Wow! Thanks!
caption: wow thanks

utterances.transcript: You're welcome, Ben. Merry Christmas, ooh, and Happy Hanukkah!
caption: ross you re welcome ben merry christmas ooh and happy hanukkah

utterances.transcript: Are you for Hanukkah, too? Because I'm part-Jewish.
caption: are you for hanukkah too because i m part jewish

utterances.transcript: You are? Me, too!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (gasps) You are? Me, too!
caption: you are me too

utterances.transcript: Because Armadillos also wandered in the desert?
caption: because armadillos also wandered in the desert

utterances.transcript: You wanna wander in the hall? Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (to Monica) You wanna wander in the hall? (to Ben) Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?
caption: you want to wander in the hall oh hey ben what if the holiday armadillo told you all about the festival of lights

utterances.transcript: Cool!
caption: cool

utterances.transcript: Yeah!
Come on Ben.
caption: monica come on ben

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Monica and Ben sit down on the couch.]

utterances.transcript: Years and years ago there were these people called the Maccabees...
caption: years and years ago there were these people called the maccabees

utterances.transcript: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (entering in a Santa costume) Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
caption: ho ho ho merry christmas

utterances.transcript: Santa!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Santa! (Runs to Chandler and hugs him)
caption: ben santa

utterances.transcript: Hey!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Hey! (Grunts as Ben hits him at full speed.)
caption: hey

utterances.transcript: What are you doing here, Santa?
caption: what are you doing here santa

utterances.transcript: Well, I'm here to see my old buddy Ben. What are you doing here, weird...turtle-man?
caption: well i m here to see my old buddy ben what are you doing here weird turtle man

utterances.transcript: I'm the Holiday Armadillo, your part-Jewish friend. You sent me here to give Ben some presents. Remember?
caption: i m the holiday armadillo your part jewish friend you sent me here to give ben some presents remember

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Did you bring me any presents, Santa?
caption: did you bring me any presents santa

utterances.transcript: You bet I did, Ben, put it there! Well, it would have worked this time, if his hands weren't so damn small! Ho, ho, ho!
utterances.transcript_with_note: You bet I did, Ben, put it there! (He shakes Ben's hand, but the money falls out of his hands) (to Monica) Well, it would have worked this time, if his hands weren't so damn small! (Realizes, that Ben is standing right there) Ho, ho, ho!
caption: you bet i did ben put her there well it would have worked this time if his hands weren t so damn small ho ho ho

utterances.transcript: Okay Ben, why don't you come open some more presents, and Santa, the Armadillo, and I have a little talk in the kitchen? There's a sentence, I never thought I'd say.
caption: ben come open more presents santa the armadillo and i will have a talk in the kitchen there s a sentence i never thought i d say

utterances.transcript_with_note: [They walk to the kitchen; everyone is lowering their voices]

utterances.transcript: What are you doing?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (to Chandler) What are you doing?
caption: what are you doing

utterances.transcript: You called everyone and said you were having trouble finding a Santa costume, so I borrowed one from a guy at work!
caption: you said you were having trouble finding a santa costume so i borrowed one from a guy at work

utterances.transcript: Thank you, but, but you gotta leave.
caption: thank you but you gotta leave

utterances.transcript: Why?
caption: why

utterances.transcript: Because, I'm finally getting him excited about Hanukkah, and, and you're-you're wrecking it.
caption: because i m finally getting him excited about hanukkah and you re wrecking it

utterances.transcript: But I didn't get to shape my belly like a bowl full of jelly.
caption: but i didn t get to shake my belly like a bowlful of jelly

utterances.transcript: I'm sorry, Chandler but this, this is really important to me.
caption: i m sorry chandler but this is really important to me

utterances.transcript: Fine, I'll give the suit back.
caption: fine i ll give the suit back

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Ross turns around and walks back to Ben.]

utterances.transcript: Hey, you think, you can keep it another night?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (to Chandler) Hey, you think, you can keep it another night? (She has a really teasing look on her face and keeps twirling Chandler's beard.)
caption: hey you think you can keep it another night

utterances.transcript: Santa? Really?
caption: santa really

utterances.transcript: Yes, is that okay?
caption: yeah is that okay

utterances.transcript: Did your Dad ever dress up like Santa?
caption: did your dad ever dress up like santa

utterances.transcript: No.
caption: no

utterances.transcript: Then it's okay!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Then it's okay! (They kiss.)
caption: then it s okay

utterances.transcript: Okay Ben, Santa has to go. Say good-bye!
caption: okay ben santa has to go say goodbye

utterances.transcript: No! Why does he have to go?
caption: no why does he have to go

utterances.transcript: Because, if Santa and the Holiday...Armadillo? ...are ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode. Merry Christmas!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Because, if Santa and the Holiday...Armadillo? (Ross nods) ...are ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode. Merry Christmas!
caption: because if santa and the holiday armadillo are ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode merry christmas

utterances.transcript: No! Why can't the Armadillo leave? I want Santa!
caption: no why can t the armadillo leave i want santa

utterances.transcript: Fine, I-I give up. Santa, Santa can stay.
caption: fine i give up santa santa can stay

utterances.transcript: Well, I'll stay, but only because I wanna hear about Hanukkah. Ben, will you sit here with Santa and learn about Hanukkah?
caption: well i ll stay but only because i want to hear about hanukkah ben will you sit here with santa and learn about hanukkah

utterances.transcript: Okay, Santa!
caption: okay santa

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Ross mouths to Chandler, "Thank you," and he mouths, "You're welcome," back.)

utterances.transcript: All right, it's time for the story of Hanukkah. Years and years ago, there were these people called the Maccabees.
caption: all right it s time for the story of hanukkah years and years ago there were these people called the maccabees

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Joey enters in a Superman-costume]

utterances.transcript: Merry Christmas!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (entering wearing a Superman costume) Merry Christmas!
caption: merry christmas

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Phoebe and Rachel's, they are entering to check out the newly refurbished apartment.]

utterances.transcript: Oh wow! Look at this place!
caption: oh wow look at this place

utterances.transcript: Oh, this is terrible. Oh, they've made so many changes I can't even feel my grandmother's presence anymore-Ooh! New sconces!
caption: oh this is terrible they ve made so many changes i can t even feel my grandmother s presence anymore oh new sconces

utterances.transcript: Oh my God!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (yelling from another room) Oh my God!
caption: oh my god

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Okay, remember uh, remember how you told me that your grandmother put up that wall to make that into two bedrooms?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (returning) Okay, remember uh, remember how you told me that your grandmother put up that wall to make that into two bedrooms?
caption: remember uh how you told me your grandmother put up that wall to make that into two bedrooms

utterances.transcript: Yeah?
caption: yeah

utterances.transcript: And remember how you always said you were afraid the landlord would find out and then tear it down?
caption: and that the landlord might find out and then tear it down

utterances.transcript: Yeah?
caption: yeah

utterances.transcript: Do you really not know where I'm going with this? It left! It's one huge room!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Do you really not know where I'm going with this? (Phoebe nods, "No.") It left! It's one huge room!
caption: do you really not know where i m going it left it s one huge room

utterances.transcript: Oh no! Oh! Wow!!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh no! (She runs to see.) (Running back, excitedly) Oh! Wow!!!
caption: oh no phoebe gasps wow

utterances.transcript: See?
caption: see

utterances.transcript: Well, I guess we'll just have to put the wall back up.
caption: i guess we ll have to put the wall back up

utterances.transcript: You can't, because of the new skylight!
caption: you can t because of the new skylight

utterances.transcript: There's a skylight?! Wow!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: There's a skylight?! (Runs to see and yells from the bedroom.) Wow!!
caption: there s a skylight wow

utterances.transcript: So what should we do? Should we start looking for a new place?
caption: oh so should we start looking for a new place

utterances.transcript: Y'know I'm-I'm sensing that um, my grandmother would not be comfortable with that.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (returning slowly) Y'know I'm-I'm sensing that um, my grandmother would not be comfortable with that.
caption: you know i m sensing that um my grandmother would not be comfortable with that

utterances.transcript: Oh yeah? Startin' to feel her again there are we?

utterances.transcript: A little bit, yeah.

utterances.transcript: Pheebs is your grandmother maybe saying that you should live here alone?
caption: is your grandmother maybe saying that you should live here alone

utterances.transcript: You heard her too?! You have the gift!

utterances.transcript: Phoebe, it's okay. I like living with Joey.

utterances.transcript: Are you sure?

utterances.transcript: Oh me too.

utterances.transcript: I know. Oh-oh, wait did you hear that-hear that? Listen, I'm gettin' something from your grandmother, she said that since you get to keep the one bedroom apartment you should give Rachel the purple chair?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Santa (Chandler), Superman (Joey), Ben, and Monica are listening to the Holiday Armadillo (Ross) finish telling the story of Hanukkah.]

utterances.transcript: ...and the miracle was that that little bit of oil that should've just lasted just one day, burned for...
caption: and the miracle was that that little bit of oil that should have lasted just one day burned for

utterances.transcript: Eight whole days.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (answering him) Eight whole days.

utterances.transcript: That's right, and that's why we celebrate Hanukkah today. The end.

utterances.transcript: Awesome!

utterances.transcript: The Armadillo was actually not so thrilled about that part! Okay Ben, it's time to light the Hanukkah candles!
utterances.transcript_with_note: The Armadillo was actually not so thrilled about that part! Okay Ben, it's time to light the Hanukkah candles! (Santa, Superman, Monica, Ben, and the Holiday Armadillo go over to the menorah to light the candles.)

utterances.transcript: Oh.

utterances.transcript: Come on, come on, we're-we're-we're lighting the candles!

utterances.transcript: I got it!

utterances.transcript: Is it back in the cage?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (yelling from the bedroom) Is it back in the cage?

utterances.transcript: Its back in cage!

plots: As a result , Rachel decides to continue living with Joey while Phoebe moves back in.
